docs.title: Welcome to Demo Inside the Lab
docs.text: This documentation will guide you through the process of downloading and deploying our dockerized application.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
Our application consists of several components:

  • Frontend (Next.js)
  • Backend (FastAPI)
  • MongoDB
  • Ollama (AI model)
  • Qdrant (Vector database)

Each component is containerized using Docker for easy deployment and scalability.

docs.title: Application Architecture
docs.text:
graph TD
    User((User)) -->|Interacts with| Frontend
    Frontend -->|API Requests| Backend
    Backend -->|Queries| MongoDB[(MongoDB)]
    Backend -->|Vector Search| Qdrant[(Qdrant)]
    Backend -->|AI Processing| Ollama[Ollama AI]
    subgraph Docker Environment
        Frontend
        Backend
        MongoDB[(MongoDB)]
        Qdrant[(Qdrant)]
        Ollama[Ollama AI]
    end

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
For quick installation and deployment instructions, please refer to the following sections:

  • Installation Guide
  • Deployment Guide

docs.title: Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide will walk you through the process of setting up the Demo Inside the Lab application on your local machine.

docs.title: Steps
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository:

```bash git clone https://github.com/yourusername/demo-inside-the-lab.git cd demo-inside-the-lab
